blocks.content:
# Welcome to the Dynatrace Support / Helpdesk Onboarding Launchpad
This Launchpad equips IT Support / Helpdesk teams with the tools and knowledge to resolve issues quickly and confidently. Whether you are diagnosing incidents, managing escalations, or ensuring service continuity, Dynatrace brings everything together in one intuitive interface helping you work smarter, faster, and with greater impact.
### Explore our Dynatrace University courses and YouTube playlists to help you getting started

content.title: Investigating Problems, Troubleshooting, and Root-cause Analysis
content.description: This beginner-friendly course introduces the fundamentals of Dynatrace Automations and SLOs

content.title: Dynatrace Essentials: Analyzing Your Observability Data
content.description: Explore how Dynatrace gives you the power to dig deep into your environment's data and gain meaningful insights.

content.title: Analyze Incidents with Davis® AI
content.description: Learn how Dynatrace AI explains issues and helps you ‘follow the red’ to pinpoint traces, logs, metrics, or root causes fast.

content.title: Ownership driven observability use cases with Dynatrace
content.description: Detect incidents, find root causes, and notify owners to cut MTTR with clear service ownership and automated workflows.

content.title: Ensure service health with Dynatrace
content.description: Scaling systems means more incidents—how do you scale response without just adding people to run manual playbooks?

blocks.content: ### Explore sample use cases via our Dynatrace Blog posts

content.title: From anomaly to root cause in under a minute
content.description: Learn how Dynatrace unifies synthetic monitoring, traces, and logs for instant insights.

content.title: Davis CoPilot expands: Get answers and insights across the Dynatrace platform
content.description: Users can now leverage natural language to quickly get answers to their questions, making it easier than ever to interact with Dynatrace.

content.title: Transform your operations with Davis AI root cause analysis
content.description: Complexity is ever-increasing in today’s world of software deployments and cloud infrastructure, making Davis® AI an indispensable tool.

blocks.content:
### Documentation
--- 
 
Dynatrace helps support and helpdesk teams triage problems by using Davis AI to automatically pinpoint root causes, correlate events across complex environments, and surface actionable insights reducing time spent on manual investigation and accelerating resolution.

#### [Problem Analysis with Davis® AI]
Accurate problem analysis is crucial for support and helpdesk teams because it reduces guesswork, shortens resolution times, and prevents recurring issues by addressing the true root cause. Dynatrace enables these best practices by providing clarity and actionable insights that streamline troubleshooting and improve overall service reliability.
  * [Root Cause Analysis](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/davis-ai-root-cause-concepts)
    * Instead of chasing symptoms, root cause analysis helps support teams zero in on the actual problem behind an incident. This means faster fixes, fewer repeat issues, and more confidence that the solution truly resolves the customer’s pain point.
  * [Traces](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/distributed-tracing-app-overview)
    * Modern applications are complex and interconnected, making it hard to know where things break. Distributed tracing gives teams a clear map of every service interaction, so they can quickly pinpoint bottlenecks or failures across the entire stack.
  * [User sessions](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/user-session-analysis-new)
    * Understanding what the user experienced is key to solving problems effectively. User session insights allow teams to replay the journey, see exactly what went wrong, and deliver resolutions that restore trust and improve satisfaction.
  * [Troubleshooting guide](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/davis-problems-troubleshooting)
    * When time is critical, having a clear, proven path to resolution matters. Troubleshooting guides provide structured steps and best practices, reducing guesswork and ensuring consistency across the team even for less experienced staff.
  * [Davis® AI](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/davis-ai-landing)
    * Manual analysis can be slow and error prone, especially in dynamic environments. Davis AI accelerates this process by intelligently correlating data and highlighting what matters most, helping teams prioritise and resolve issues with confidence.
    
#### [Ownership and Alerting]
Clear ownership is essential for support and helpdesk teams to ensure accountability and swift resolution, avoiding delays caused by unclear responsibilities. Dynatrace reinforces this best practice by providing visibility that helps teams assign and manage issues effectively across complex environments.
* [Ownership](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/ownership)
  * Clear accountability is essential when multiple teams are involved. Ownership tags make it easy to assign responsibility, avoid confusion, and ensure that issues are handled by the right people without delays.
* [Workflows](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/workflows)
  * Repetitive tasks can drain time and energy from support teams. Automated workflows streamline these processes, ensuring that routine actions happen quickly and reliably, so teams can focus on solving complex, high-impact problems.
* [Connections](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/workflows-actions)
  * Too many alerts can overwhelm teams, while too few can lead to missed incidents. Smart alerting profiles and workflow connections ensure the right people get the right notifications at the right time, with actionable context to drive rapid response.
